about_the_game:
Your phone rings - a crime has been committed. The local police need your help to solve the case! Investigate the crime scene, find evidence and put the suspect behind bars! No matter if it's murder, theft or burglary - explore the detailed crime scene and listen to your gut feelings. I'm sure you'll crack the case!

The city trusts your detective skills - don't disappoint them!



At the crime scenes there are a lot of objects waiting for you to interact with. Look at everything very carefully. Even small details can have a big impact on the case!



Document everything that seems important in the in.game notebook, take pictures of the evidence and put it all together!
Do your job properly and take the time you need. This is the only way you will be able to solve the case!



Some suspects try to manipulate evidence or make it disappear entirely. Search every little spot. For example, use your flashlight to find evidence even in the darkest corners. At the end you will see if you could find all the evidence!


  • Detailed crime scenes to explore
  • Different crimes like murder or burglary
  • In-game notebook and photo mode
  • Interaction with many objects

Important information

The Evidence is not a story-based game. The game can be compared to a puzzle game. There is no information given to the player in advance about the crime scene or the victim in each case. Some evidence is lost at the crime scenes. The player has to fill these gaps with his conclusions!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX660 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: In The Evidence you take over the role of a detective who has to search for evidence at crime scenes in order to put the criminal behind bars. You have some tools available to you, but it won't be easy! The local police need your help. Don't disappoint them!
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
